overview_of_class: Methods and operations in SEM and TEM. Electron optics. Interpretation of electron micrographs and electron diffraction. Microchemical analysis. Applications of SEM & TEM.
name: Introduction to Electron Microscopy
title: MEAS MAT_SCI 360-0-20 Introduction to Electron Microscopy

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Methods and operations in SEM and TEM. Electron optics. Interpretation of electron micrographs and electron diffraction. Microchemical analysis. Applications of SEM & TEM.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Two lectures per week, and one 2-hour laboratory per two weeks. Students are required to complete a lab project of own design, applying TEM and/or SEM to study microstructure of materials.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value: D.B. Williams and C. B. Carter, Transmission Electron Microscopy, Springer, 2004. ISBN-10: 030645324X ISBN-13: 978-0306453243

subject: MAT_SCI
